name: Sacae
startIntroPart2: We are a nomadic people, who will not hesitate to band together should need be.
declaringWar: Our tribes are in agreement. Prepare for war!
attacked: We will band together to fight off any threat!
defeated: Our people are scattered but not broken. This is not the last you will see of me.
introduction: Welcome to the plains. How may I help you today?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
